Tokyo Trip Itinerary - April 2024

Day One - Arrival and Shibuya

Arrive at Narita Airport around noon. Take the Narita Express to Shibuya Station. Check into the hotel and rest for a few hours after the long flight.

In the evening, explore Shibuya Crossing and grab dinner at a local ramen shop. The area is beautiful at night with all the neon lights.

Day Two - Traditional Tokyo

Start early with a visit to Senso-ji Temple in Asakusa. This is the oldest temple in Tokyo and the surrounding area has wonderful traditional shops and street food.

Afternoon tea ceremony experience in Ueno. Evening walk through Yanaka, one of the few areas that survived the war and maintains its old town charm.

Day Three - Modern Tokyo

Visit teamLab Borderless digital art museum in the morning. Reservations required. Plan to spend at least three hours there.

Lunch in Odaiba followed by shopping in Ginza. Return to hotel to pack for departure the following morning.
